landing.title: Memory Match Mobile
landing.subtitle: Cognitive Assessment Game
landing.description1: Memory Match Mobile is a lightweight cognitive memory game that tests auditory memory and recall. The app plays a sequence of three different sounds, then challenges users to identify which sounds they heard after a brief delay.
landing.description2: Designed as a lightweight application that works efficiently even in rural areas with limited internet connectivity, the app runs entirely in your browser with minimal data usage. All performance data is stored locally on your device for complete privacy, making it accessible to communities worldwide regardless of infrastructure constraints.
landing.disclaimer: This is a screening tool, not a medical diagnostic device. Consult healthcare professionals for any concerns.

game.title: Memory Match!
game.performanceNote: Performance Note: Consider consulting healthcare professional.
game.setupSubtitle: This assessment uses sound memory to evaluate cognitive function. Please have a healthcare professional nearby.
game.setupDescription: You will hear a sequence of sounds. Remember the order and select them correctly.
game.selectPhase: Now select the sounds in order
game.alertMessage: Please complete or cancel the current test before changing language.

about.title: About This Project
about.projectGoalText: This cognitive assessment tool is designed for under-resourced settings, particularly rural areas with limited internet connectivity. The app runs entirely in the browser and stores data locally for privacy.
